Articles.Content:
After TT released the Modular Multi-wheels 0.6 thing with the engines, I thought I might have a go at making some engines that actually have some sounds when their being used instead of the horrible silence you normally get when driving around. I was thinking about using sounds from the Swedish Scania V8's, because they are awesome . Feel free to suggest any ideas for what you would/wouldn't like.

A preview of some Scania V8's:

Psycho529

(Oh and I'm not really going to do much until the summer holidays when I have more time for this as I'm working on so many things at the moment )

As there is almost no interest in this I'm just scrapping it and will only get round to it at a later date for personal use, unless there is actually some interest for this.

Psycho529
